Question: The German magazine Stern published a critical article on the first anniversary of this person's death.
Hints: This person Day (Dita e Nënë Terezës) on 19 October is a public holiday in Albania.
This person accepted donations from the autocratic and corrupt Duvalier family in Haiti and openly praised them.
This person served there for almost twenty years and in 1944 was appointed headmistress.
